Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of housing preservation and development to submit reports on veteran preference in Mitchell-Lama developments
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the department of housing preservation and development to submit reports on veteran preference in Mitchell-Lama developments.

Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Supporting veteran vendors.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to waiving permit fees for mobile food unit commissaries that reserve space for veteran vendors
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Waiving permit fees for mobile food unit commissaries that reserve space for veteran vendors.

Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Providing rental assistance to homeless veterans.

Items.Title: A Local Law in relation to requiring a study and recommendations on the feasibility of implementing a pilot program to provide reconsolidation of traumatic memories therapy for veterans
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring a study and recommendations on the feasibility of implementing a pilot program to provide reconsolidation of traumatic memories therapy for veterans.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York City Department of Education to observe Veterans Day the Friday before November 11th if it falls on a Saturday and the Monday after the 11th if it falls on a Sunday.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: DOE to observe Veterans Day the Friday before November 11th if it falls on a Saturday and the Monday after the 11th if it falls on a Sunday.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Assembly to pass, and the Governor to sign, S.2028-A/A.2965-A, to establish a property tax exemption for veterans with a 100 percent service-connected disability.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Establish a property tax exemption for veterans with a 100 percent service-connected disability (S.2028-A/A.2965-A).

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York City Housing Authority to include an admission preference for public housing in its next proposed agency plan for all veterans of the U.S. military.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: New York City Housing Authority to include an admission preference for public housing in its next proposed agency plan for all veterans of the U.S. military.

Items.Title: Roll Call

Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Approved by Committee
